channel.title: Paying Paypal $20 For Somebody to Code my Server!@@!
channel.description: [size=18pt]I am an amateur coder and need help with my server, and I am willing to pay $20 to somebody to do some coding for me. Basically what would happen is I would tell you what I want you to code and you code it. :D $20 Paypal Dollars!@#!@:D.[/size]

item.title: Paying Paypal $20 For Somebody to Code my Server!@@!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:3, topic:453536”]Money is not a form of rewarding allowed. The most you could do is rep them for their time and help and/or thank them. You are not, however, allowed to offer rep.

Maybe try to start a development team and look for teammates and learn some things for yourself so you know what do to by yourself.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Paying Paypal $20 For Somebody to Code my Server!@@!

item.title: Paying Paypal $20 For Somebody to Code my Server!@@!
item.dc:creator: @24jared24 24jared24
item.description:
@24jared24 wrote:

Not only is this against rules, it wouldn’t be your server if you did no work on it… the best part of making a server is learning new things

Read full topic

item.title: Paying Paypal $20 For Somebody to Code my Server!@@!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Money is not a form of rewarding allowed. The most you could do is rep them for their time and help and/or thank them. You are not, however, allowed to offer rep.

Maybe try to start a development team and look for teammates and learn some things for yourself so you know what do to by yourself.

Read full topic
